author: Xbox
description:
Heart-pounding action. High-intensity combat. Destruction like you have never seen it before.

Our Hero squad goes head to head with the Pax Armata threat as they storm a war torn New York City on the brink of collapse.

This is all-out warfare. This is Battlefield 6. Deployment begins October 10.

author: Xbox
description:
Projekt Z: Beyond Order will be available in 2026 on Xbox Series X|S.
Wishlist now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/projekt-z-beyond-order/9mxj58hptxqz

Experience the intense action of battling the undead on Xbox Series in this thrilling first-person zombie shooter with robust character progression and extensive weapon customization. Set around World War II, take on fast-paced missions or explore the terrifying island in Free Roam mode as one of four survivors, each with their own unique abilities and role in 4-player co-op. Shoot, loot, craft, survive.

author: Xbox
description:
Embark on your next journey and discover the joy of train simulation. Be ready for anything as you master formidable trains across 3 new routes. Unlock new skills and expand your hobby - Expect the Unexpected in Train Sim World 6!

Out Now on Xbox! https://www.xbox.com/games/store/train-sim-world-6-standard-edition/9PJJ15JR1ZWK

Expand your collection further with 3 additional, brand-new trains in Deluxe / Specials Editions.
Play for free! Download the Free Starter Pack today and access the Training Center and 5 trains to choose from.

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready to move with your whole body with Just Dance 2026 Edition!
We’re welcoming back full body tracking, and this time, it’s available on all consoles! 

Your entire body becomes the controller when you’re playing solo. All you need is the free Just Dance App* on your smartphone.
No limits, no excuses. Just Dance.

Every move count toward your score when playing the Camera Controller Mode.
The precise motion detection makes it this the most dynamic Just Dance experience yet.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/just-dance-2026-edition/9NTTPT6PC2FT/0010

*No additional accessories required! Requires IOS 18 or higher OR Android 15 or higher.

author: Xbox
description:
Let the party begin! Gather your friends because LEGO® Party! is available now on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One!

LEGO® Party! is a cross-platform party game for up to four players that's built different! Compete against your friends in wacky Challenge Zones and 60 hilarious minigames from across your favorite LEGO sets like Pirates, Space, NINJAGO®, and more. Join your friends online no matter their platform, for a LEGO Party game night.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/lego-party/9PHH78ZGBF96/0010

author: Xbox
description:
Not once in my entire life… have I gone into battle expecting to lose!
 
The battle comes to its thrilling conclusion when MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice releases on February 6th, 2026 – available on Xbox Series X|S!
 
Pre-order now to receive early access to two playable characters: 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/my-hero-academia-alls-justice-pre-order/9PG1PJZQ4DRH  
 
The MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Season Pass – including 5 additional playable characters to be released post-launch.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the Season Pass, 20 additional costumes, and 7 HUD banners.
 
#MHA #MHAAJ

author: Xbox
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is powering up with its biggest update since launch! With both free and paid content, there is something for everyone. We are taking the game to the next level. Available now!

NEW ARCADE MODE – HEX AND FLEX YOUR WAY (Free). Arcade Mode is intense, fast-paced, and offers unique challenge runs.

NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTER – METALHEAD (DLC). He is our first full-range hero, armed with a powerful laser gun, explosive landmines, and tactical skills.

METALHEAD COMPANION CONTENT (Free). Metalhead’s debut ties directly into the free Arcade Mode, bringing additional narrative and content for all players.

GAME IMPROVEMENTS (Free). We’ve also added over 100 improvements across the game.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-splintered-fate/9nm22mrrmx6z
